entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.2.0
entry.content:
New in v6.2: - SimpleX Chat and Flux (https://runonflux.com) made an agreement to include servers operated by Flux into the app – to improve metadata privacy. - Business chats – your customers' privacy. - Improved user experience of chats: - Open chat on the first unread message. - Jump to quoted messages anywhere in the conversation. - See who reacted to messages. - Improved iOS push notifications.
